data.name: faq.headers.third
data.value: Our housing advisors are ready to assist you

data.name: home.hero-slider.header
data.value: A new way to buy and sell property

data.name: home.hero-slider.infoText
data.value: Welcome to a hassle-free real estate journey. Explore the finest homes and find everything you need in one place, regardless of whether you're selling or buying.

data.name: home.steps-buying.header
data.value: Buying a new home is easy with us

data.name: home.steps-buying.infoParagraph
data.value: Buying a home is one of the biggest purchases you make in life. Our housing advisors are ready to help you navigate listings, book walkthroughs and follow you all the way to completing complex contracts and paperwork.

data.value: 1. Define budget and what you can afford

data.name: home.steps-buying.stepHeaders.stepTwo

data.value: We advice you through every step of the journey
